benchmark_details.name: RoLargeSum
benchmark_details.overview: RoLargeSum is a large-scale summarization dataset for the Romanian language, containing more than 615K news articles from various news websites, along with their summaries, headlines, keywords, dialect information, and other metadata.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Create a high-quality summarization dataset for the Romanian language to support the development of summarization models.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The distribution of dialects in RoLargeSum is not uniform, mainly due to the varying number of newspapers in Romania and Moldova.

data.source: Crawled from various publicly available news websites in Romania and Moldova.
data.annotation: Data manually cleaned and organized; summaries and metadata attached where available.

methodology.calculation: ROUGE scores calculated based on unigram and bigram overlap as well as longest common subsequence.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ROUGE scores indicate better summarization performance.
methodology.baseline_results: mBART-large achieved the highest scores of ROUGE-1: 44.57, ROUGE-2: 24.03, ROUGE-L: 36.10 for the RO+MD task.
methodology.validation: Evaluation on training, validation, and testing splits with metrics reported.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Data includes a dialect classification of news articles, with a significant imbalance between Romanian and Moldovan articles.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data collected from publicly accessible news websites, with citations and URLs for verification.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data used strictly for academic and research purposes; respects copyright and intellectual property rights.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Data collection complies with relevant ethical guidelines.
